DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to determine if pre-treatment swallowing exercises can improve post-treatment swallowing function in patients undergoing radiation with or without chemotherapy for advanced squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck.
DOC.brief_title: Pre-treatment Exercises Versus Post-treatment Exercises for Dysphagia
DOC.criteria: Stage III or IV squamous cell cancer of teh pharynx and larynx Patients who will be receiving chemoradiation Age 19 years of age or older Must sign informed consent. Prior cancer diagnosis Metastatic disease Cognitive Impairment
DOC.keyword: Patients with H&N cancer who will be receiving chemoradiation
